sn35.1:1.2: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn35.1:2.4: Yadanatta tam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn35.1:2.12: Yadanatta tam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn35.1:2.18: Yadanatta tam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn35.1:2.19: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, sotasmimpi nibbindati, ghanasmimpi nibbindati, jivhayapi nibbindati, kayasmimpi nibbindati, manasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35.1:2.20: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn35.1:2.21: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
